title: unable to connect to pvp server
body: Is there an issue with connecting to the pvp server i keep getting an error saying un able to connect. Tried to repair and tried to link it gives for possible reasons. Nothing has worked.

replies.body: I wasn't able to see any issues with pvp.net.  Your network might be having some issues specifically connecting with pvp.net.  It's really important to get that fixed otherwise you can't chat with your friends or run into issues later like during champion select.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
